text: @realDonaldTrump You knew what you were doing . You got the MAGA racist all hot and wet by scheduling your rally on #Juneteenth, with your dog whistle. They were willing to come out in droves, even with your legal disclaimer to not hold you liable, if you kill  them with COVID19 ! #BLM Forever ✊🏿

entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
